fields.name: addressCountry
fields.title: Address Country
fields.description: The country. For example, USA. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

fields.name: addressLocality
fields.title: Address Locality
fields.description: The locality. For example, Mountain View.

fields.name: postOfficeBoxNumber
fields.title: Post Office Box Number
fields.description: The post office box number for PO box addresses.

fields.name: streetAddress
fields.title: Street Address
fields.description: The street address. For example, 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy.

fields.name: location
fields.title: Geographic Location
fields.description: The geographic coordinates which represent the address location.

fields.name: contactType
fields.title: Contact Type
fields.description: A person or organization can have different contact points, for different purposes. For example, a sales contact point, a PR contact point and so on. This property is used to specify the kind of contact point.

fields.name: email
fields.title: Email Address
fields.description: An email address associated with this item.

fields.name: telephone
fields.title: Telephone
fields.description: A telephone number associated with this item.

fields.name: faxNumber
fields.title: Fax Nunber
fields.description: A fax number associated with this item.
